NK040(thi)035:1: // mdzes ma 'bum bskul bsdus pa bzhugs /
NK040(thi)035:2: ma shar lho nub byang dbus mtshams na bzhugs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma //
NK040(thi)035:3: sku mdog sngon mo ser mo dmar ljang mo dkar mo sna tshogs mdzes pa'i cha byad can //
NK040(thi)035:4: 'khor yang sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo mdzes ma 'bum gyis bskor //
NK040(thi)035:5: pad+ma sngon ser dmar ljang dkar sna tshogs mo'i gdan la bzhugs //
NK040(thi)035:6: phyag na pad snod sngon po ser po dmar po ljang gu dkar po sna tshogs bsnams //
NK040(thi)035:7: dbu la thor tshugs brgyan gyis brgyan //
NK040(thi)035:8: rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dpe spras //
NK040(thi)035:9: ma 'khor dang bcas pa khyed rnams la //
NK040(thi)035:11: rgyan gyi gtor ma 'di bzhes la //
NK040(thi)035:13: rkyen dang bar chad zhi bar mdzod //
